paper_abstract: We investigate the parameterized complexity of MAXIMUM INDEPENDENT SET and DOMINATING SET restricted to certain geometric graphs. We show that DOMINATING SET is W[l]-hard for the intersection graphs of unit squares, unit disks, and line segments. For MAXIMUM INDEPENDENT SET, we show that the problem is W[l]-complete for unit segments, but fixed-parameter tractable if the segments axe axis-parallel.
paper_title: Parameterized complexity of independence and domination on geometric graphs
